title: Naruto Movie 2: Dai Gekitotsu! Maboroshi no Chiteiiseki Dattebayo!
synopsis: In a tumultuous effort, the Sunagakure ninjas attempt to repel an unforeseen invasion of mysterious armored warriors on the Land of Wind. Shortly afterwards, the same armored troops led by Temujin—a skilled knight of impressive power—ambush Naruto Uzumaki, Sakura Haruno, and Shikamaru Nara, who are on a mission to recover a lost ferret. Naruto and Temujin engage in a fierce fight that ends with both of them falling off a cliff.
related_anime: ['Gekijouban Naruto: Dai Gekitotsu! Maboroshi no Chitei Iseki Datteba yo', 'Naruto']
